item.title: Prometheus Basic Ideas
item.description: This blog will give a short introduction for the open source project Prometheus. It is based on the official website and an online book in Chinese, but I also added some explaintions and understanding from the blog author to help any green hands to better understand it and its usage. The first two parts will offer a brief intro to Prometheus. The third part will guide to download it and open the service.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi! I am Summer, a programmer in her 20s and someone who also has a passion for life. This is the website where I would post my thoughts, my study record and life sharing occasionally. Here are the things to be expected: Pole dancing. I love both the pole tricks and exotic dances. Tales. My favorite one is The lord of the ring. Though I like it a lot but I am far from an expert in it.
